LanguageData.VME_AncientSystemRack.label: ancient system rack
LanguageData.VME_AncientSystemRack.description: An ancient rack unit packed with unidentifiable devices. Valuable parts are missing, and everything else is degraded to uselessness.
LanguageData.VME_AncientEquipmentBlocks.label: ancient equipment blocks
LanguageData.VME_AncientEquipmentBlocks.description: A collection of ancient equipment blocks of unknown function. Valuable parts are missing, and everything else is degraded to uselessness.
LanguageData.VME_AncientMachine.label: ancient machine
LanguageData.VME_AncientMachine.description: A large ancient machine case filled with unknown machinery. Valuable parts are missing, and everything else is degraded to uselessness.
LanguageData.VME_AncientStorageCylinder.label: ancient storage cylinder
LanguageData.VME_AncientStorageCylinder.description: An ancient device that looks like it once stored some kind of fluid. Valuable parts are missing, and everything else is degraded to uselessness.
LanguageData.VME_AncientLamp.label: ancient lamp
LanguageData.VME_AncientLamp.description: An ancient self-powered lamp. Its internal power supply is badly depleted, but it still emits a weak glow.
LanguageData.VME_AncientBed.label: ancient bed
LanguageData.VME_AncientBed.description: An old, rotted mattress on a rusty frame. Though uncomfortable, it can still be used, but its too dilapidated to restore.
LanguageData.VME_AncientDisplayBank.label: ancient display bank
LanguageData.VME_AncientDisplayBank.description: An ancient computer interface. Valuable parts are missing, and everything else is degraded to uselessness.
LanguageData.VME_AncientLockerBank.label: ancient locker bank
LanguageData.VME_AncientLockerBank.description: An ancient, rusted bank of lockers. All of the lockers have been forced open with nothing valuable left behind.
LanguageData.VME_AncientCrate.label: ancient crate
LanguageData.VME_AncientCrate.description: An ancient, broken crate. Any valuables it once contained have degraded to uselessness.
LanguageData.VME_AncientMilitaryCrate.label: ancient military crate
LanguageData.VME_AncientMilitaryCrate.description: An ancient, military-looking crate. It was broken long ago and any valuables it once contained were looted.
LanguageData.VME_AncientSpacerCrate.label: ancient spacer crate
LanguageData.VME_AncientSpacerCrate.description: An ancient, broken crate. Any valuables it once contained were taken long ago.
LanguageData.VME_AncientBarrel.label: ancient barrel
LanguageData.VME_AncientBarrel.description: An ancient, broken barrel that looks like it once contained waste of some sort. The only thing it contains now is a smear of dried sludge.
LanguageData.VME_AncientGenerator.label: ancient generator
LanguageData.VME_AncientGenerator.description: An ancient electrical generator. Its usable parts were smashed or looted long ago, and the rest has rusted into uselessness.
LanguageData.VME_AncientOperatingTable.label: ancient operating table
LanguageData.VME_AncientOperatingTable.description: A table once used for surgical operations. It has long since deteriorated into uselessness.
LanguageData.VME_AncientShoppingCart.label: ancient shopping cart
LanguageData.VME_AncientShoppingCart.description: An ancient, rusted shopping cart. How exactly it got here is a mystery, but the story is long and probably quite sad.
LanguageData.VME_AncientPostbox.label: ancient postbox
LanguageData.VME_AncientPostbox.description: An ancient postbox, smashed and deteriorated to uselessness. It seems to have been moved here long ago for some unknown reason.
LanguageData.VME_AncientVendingMachine.label: ancient vending machine
LanguageData.VME_AncientVendingMachine.description: An ancient vending machine. It was smashed ages ago and generations of looters have taken every conceivably useful part. How it ended up here is a mystery.
LanguageData.VME_AncientAirConditioner.label: ancient air conditioner
LanguageData.VME_AncientAirConditioner.description: An ancient air conditioning machine. Its internals were smashed long ago and what wasnt looted has rusted away in the time since.
LanguageData.VME_AncientKitchenSink.label: ancient kitchen sink
LanguageData.VME_AncientKitchenSink.description: An ancient kitchen sink made of some non-metallic fiber-sheet material. It is badly deteriorated and theres no way to salvage anything from it.\n\nHow it got here must be a long story.
LanguageData.VME_AncientStove.label: ancient stove
LanguageData.VME_AncientStove.description: An ancient stove. Smashed and rusted, it is completely useless now.\n\nHow it got here is hard to say.
LanguageData.VME_AncientOven.label: ancient oven
LanguageData.VME_AncientOven.description: An ancient oven. Smashed and rusted, it is completely useless now.\n\nHow it got here is hard to say.
LanguageData.VME_AncientATM.label: ancient ATM
LanguageData.VME_AncientATM.description: An ancient ATM. Smashed and rusted, it is completely useless now.\n\nHow it got here is hard to say.
LanguageData.VME_AncientWashingMachine.label: ancient washing machine
LanguageData.VME_AncientWashingMachine.description: An ancient device used for washing textiles. Smashed and rusted, it is completely useless now.\n\nHow it got here is hard to say.
LanguageData.VME_AncientHydrant.label: ancient hydrant
LanguageData.VME_AncientHydrant.description: An ancient hydrant. Heavily rusted, it is completely useless now.\n\nHow it got here is hard to say.
LanguageData.VME_AncientMicrowave.label: ancient microwave
LanguageData.VME_AncientMicrowave.description: An ancient device for heating food. Smashed and rusted, it is completely useless now.\n\nHow it got here is hard to say.
LanguageData.VME_AncientToilet.label: ancient toilet
LanguageData.VME_AncientToilet.description: An ancient toilet. Smashed long ago, it is completely useless now.\n\nHow it got here is hard to say.
LanguageData.VME_AncientRefrigerator.label: ancient refrigerator
LanguageData.VME_AncientRefrigerator.description: An ancient refrigerator. It was stripped of interesting parts long ago.
LanguageData.VME_AncientSmallCrate.label: ancient small crate
LanguageData.VME_AncientSmallCrate.description: A small, empty crate which was abandoned ages ago. Its too rusted to store anything.
LanguageData.VME_AncientLongCrate.label: ancient long crate
LanguageData.VME_AncientLongCrate.description: A long, empty crate which was abandoned ages ago. Its too rusted to store anything.
LanguageData.VME_AncientLargeCrate.label: ancient large crate
LanguageData.VME_AncientLargeCrate.description: A large crate which was abandoned ages ago. Its too rusted to store anything.
LanguageData.VME_AncientWheel.label: ancient wheel
LanguageData.VME_AncientWheel.description: An ancient wheel from some kind of vehicle. The rubber has deteriorated away and the metal is twisted and rusted.
LanguageData.VME_AncientGiantWheel.label: ancient giant wheel
LanguageData.VME_AncientGiantWheel.description: A giant wheel which came off some large vehicle many ages ago. The rubber has disintegrated away and the metal is twisted and rusted.
LanguageData.VME_AncientRustedCar.label: ancient car
LanguageData.VME_AncientRustedCar.description: An ancient, broken car. Everything that isnt rusted away was looted long ago.
LanguageData.VME_AncientRustedTruck.label: ancient truck
LanguageData.VME_AncientRustedTruck.description: An ancient, broken truck. Everything useful either rusted away or was looted long ago.
LanguageData.VME_AncientRustedJeep.label: ancient troop carrier
LanguageData.VME_AncientRustedJeep.description: An ancient, broken troop carrier. Everything that isnt rusted away was looted long ago.
LanguageData.VME_AncientRustedCarFrame.label: ancient car frame
LanguageData.VME_AncientRustedCarFrame.description: An ancient, rusted car frame. The body shell has long since rusted away to nothing.
LanguageData.VME_AncientWarwalkerTorso.label: ancient warwalker torso
LanguageData.VME_AncientWarwalkerTorso.description: The torso of a mid-scale warwalker which fell here in ancient days. The valuable parts were looted long ago.
LanguageData.VME_AncientRustedDropship.label: ancient dropship
LanguageData.VME_AncientRustedDropship.description: The remains of an ancient dropship. The valuable parts were looted long ago and the rest has deteriorated to uselessness.
LanguageData.VME_AncientWarwalkerClaw.label: ancient warwalker claw
LanguageData.VME_AncientWarwalkerClaw.description: The assault claw of an ancient mid-scale warwalker. This weapon specialized in tearing through heavy plasteel armor at close range. Its valuable components were looted long ago.
LanguageData.VME_AncientWarwalkerLeg.label: ancient warwalker leg
LanguageData.VME_AncientWarwalkerLeg.description: The shattered leg of a mid-scale warwalker that fell here long ago. It has been picked clean by looters, and no valuable components remain.
LanguageData.VME_AncientMiniWarwalkerRemains.label: ancient warsprinter remains
LanguageData.VME_AncientMiniWarwalkerRemains.descript: The shattered remains of an ancient sub-scale warsprinter. Whatever parts werent ruined when it was destroyed were looted long ago.
LanguageData.VME_AncientWarspiderRemains.label: ancient warspider remains
LanguageData.VME_AncientWarspiderRemains.description: The ruined remains of an ancient mid-scale warspider. It has been picked over many times, and there is nothing valuable left to loot.
LanguageData.VME_AncientPipelineSection.label: ancient pipeline section
LanguageData.VME_AncientPipelineSection.description: A section from an ancient pipeline. It once carried some valuable fluid over long distances. Now its been looted and deteriorated to uselessness.
LanguageData.VME_AncientWarwalkerFoot.label: ancient warwalker foot
LanguageData.VME_AncientWarwalkerFoot.description: A massive foot from an ancient warwalker. It seems to have been torn free from its owner by some kind of heavy weapon. All the useful components were looted or deteriorated long ago.
LanguageData.VME_AncientTank.label: ancient ruined tank
LanguageData.VME_AncientTank.description: The remains of an ancient tank which was destroyed by some kind of heavy weapon. All the useful components were looted or deteriorated long ago.
LanguageData.VME_AncientAPC.label: ancient ruined APC
LanguageData.VME_AncientAPC.description: The remains of an ancient armoured troop carrier which was destroyed by some kind of heavy weapon. All the useful components were looted or deteriorated long ago.
LanguageData.VME_AncientWarwalkerShell.label: ancient warwalker shell
LanguageData.VME_AncientWarwalkerShell.description: Most of the armored shell of a warwalker. It appears to have been torn off by some colossal weapon system. All the valuable parts were looted, and the rest is badly deteriorated.
LanguageData.VME_AncientJetEngine.label: ancient jet engine
LanguageData.VME_AncientJetEngine.description: An ancient jet engine, probably detached from a large airplane. Its delicate internals are rusted to uselessness, and the valuable parts were looted long ago.
LanguageData.VME_AncientDropshipEngine.label: ancient dropship engine
LanguageData.VME_AncientDropshipEngine.description: An ancient dropship engine. It probably came off a military troop carrier. Its delicate internals are rusted to uselessness, and the valuable parts were looted long ago.
LanguageData.VME_AncientPodCar.label: ancient pod car
LanguageData.VME_AncientPodCar.description: An ancient pod car once capable of automated flight. Its valuable parts were looted long ago, and the rest is badly deteriorated.
LanguageData.VME_AncientTankTrap.label: ancient tank trap
LanguageData.VME_AncientTankTrap.description: An defensive fortification for stopping vehicles. Its been deteriorating for many years.
LanguageData.VME_AncientLargeRustedEngineBlock.label: ancient macro-engine block
LanguageData.VME_AncientLargeRustedEngineBlock.descri: An large, ancient engine block from some giant vehicle or power source. Its rusted through, and all the useful components are gone. No repair could salvage this.
LanguageData.VME_AncientFence.label: ancient fence
LanguageData.VME_AncientFence.description: An ancient fence made of reinforced concrete posts joined by concrete panels.
LanguageData.VME_AncientRazorWire.label: ancient razor wire
LanguageData.VME_AncientRazorWire.description: A piece of ancient razor wire. It has been deteriorating for many years and no longer poses any danger.
LanguageData.VME_AncientPipes.label: ancient pipes
LanguageData.VME_AncientPipes.description: A bunch of rusted old pipes. It is hard to say how these ended up here.
LanguageData.VME_AncientMegaCannonTripod.label: ancient mega-cannon platform
LanguageData.VME_AncientMegaCannonTripod.description: A mounting platform that once held some sort of cannon. It has been broken for many years and every useful component was looted long ago.
LanguageData.VME_AncientMegaCannonBarrel.label: ancient mega-cannon barrel
LanguageData.VME_AncientMegaCannonBarrel.description: A barrel from a long-range cannon for artillery or anti-ship use. When it was new, it must have been frighteningly powerful. Now, its far beyond repair and every useful component has been looted.
LanguageData.VME_AncientContainer.label: ancient container
LanguageData.VME_AncientContainer.description: A large container from some ancient freight carrying vehicle. It has long since been looted and deteriorted into uselessness.
LanguageData.VME_AncientMechanoidShell.label: ancient mechanoid shell
LanguageData.VME_AncientMechanoidShell.description: A shell from a smashed mechanoid. It has been deteriorating for many years and the useful components have disintegrated.
LanguageData.VME_AncientCentipedeShell.label: ancient centipede shell
LanguageData.VME_AncientCentipedeShell.description: A shell from a smashed centipede. It has been deteriorating for many years and all the useful components have disintegrated.
LanguageData.VME_AncientMechDropBeacon.label: ancient mech drop beacon
LanguageData.VME_AncientMechDropBeacon.description: The broken shell of a mech drop beacon. Its useful components are missing and the shell has deteriorated after many years.
LanguageData.VME_AncientSecurityTurret.label: ancient security turret
LanguageData.VME_AncientSecurityTurret.description: An ancient, broken security turret. The valuable parts have all been looted or smashed.
LanguageData.VME_AncientRustedEngineBlock.label: ancient engine block
LanguageData.VME_AncientRustedEngineBlock.description: An ancient engine block that is rusted through. No repair could salvage this.
LanguageData.VME_AncientShipBeacon.label: ancient nav beacon
LanguageData.VME_AncientShipBeacon.description: An ancient, broken ship navigation beacon. Every useful component was looted long ago.
LanguageData.VME_AncientSpaceJunk.label: ancient space junk
LanguageData.VME_AncientSpaceJunk.description: Ancient chunks of space junk that fell from orbit. Perhaps a relic of an ancient space battle.
LanguageData.VME_WickerMan.label: wicker man
LanguageData.VME_WickerMan.description: A large humanoid figure made out of dry brush, thatch, and wood scraps. Prisoners have to be physically restrained to the figurine then burned alive as part of a trial or ritual.
LanguageData.VME_Bonfire.label: bonfire
LanguageData.VME_Bonfire.description: An incredibly large and bright-burning bonfire made out of a carefully organized pile of logs on a stone base. Used heavily during flame-based rituals and can only be placed outdoors.
LanguageData.VME_BonfireAfterRitual.label: bonfire
LanguageData.VME_BonfireAfterRitual.description: An incredibly large and bright-burning bonfire made out of a carefully organized pile of logs on a stone base. Used heavily during flame-based rituals and can only be placed outdoors. Will last for at least two quadrums and provide beauty nearby, as well as count for the Fire: Desired precept.
LanguageData.VME_MechanoidEffigy.label: mechanoid effigy
LanguageData.VME_MechanoidEffigy.description: A structure assembled from scrapped mechanoid parts. Emits an IFF programming signal capable of confusing ancient mechanoid receptors. Should two exist per colonist enough signal noise will soft reset ancient mechanoid programming, causing an immediate retreat.
LanguageData.VME_Obelisk.label: ominous obelisk
LanguageData.VME_Obelisk.description: An ominous-looking obelisk of pure chiseled stone. It seems to radiate an aura of hopelessness and despair.\n\nThe Corruption need of any colonist in an obelisks radius of effect wont decrease.
LanguageData.VME_InsectNest.label: insect nest
LanguageData.VME_InsectNest.description: A large, swollen hive that seems to be seeping high amounts of bubbling insectoid jelly but not incubating any insectoids themselves.\n\nThe nest will need maintenance by a colonist with the insectoid herder role. If maintenance reaches 0%, the nest will be destroyed.
